extension.description: SoundCloud is a platform for musicians to promote and distribute their music online.This is a third-party add-on, which uses public web services exposed by SoundCloud. Neither the XBMC community, nor the developers of this add-on is in any way affiliated with SoundCloud Ltd.

SoundCloud е платформа за музиканти, която им позволява да представят и разпространяват музиката си чрез интернет. Добавката ползва услугите на SoundCloud. Нито общността около XBMC, нито разработчиците на добавката са свързани по някакъв начин със SoundCloud Ltd.

SoundCloud is een platform voor muzikanten om hun muziek online te promoten en distruberen. Dit is een third-party addon die de publieke web services van SoundCloud gebruikt. Noch de XMBC gemeenschap, noch de ontwikkelaars van deze addon zijn betrokken met SoundCloud Ltd.
